[color=GOLD]Unstable Energies[/color]
Whenever this tower hits a creep, it has a chance to release a powerful energy blast at the cost of some mana, dealing [color=6495edff]Elemental[/color] damage.
 
[color=GOLD]Mana Distortion Field - Aura[/color]
Whenever a nearby tower attacks, it burns mana from the main target and deals spell damage to it. The mana burn costs the Drake some mana.

[color=LIGHT_BLUE]An elven mage who has devoted his entire life to the study of time.[/color]
[color=YELLOW]Author:[/color] Majildian

[color=GOLD]Future Knowledge[/color]

[color=GOLD]Time Twist - Aura[/color]
The Manipulator reaches into the timestream and brings bonuses to nearby towers.
 
[color=GOLD]Time Field[/color]
The Manipulator creates a field of time that inflicts future spell damage upon creatures around him.
 
Mana cost: [color=GOLD]500[/color], [color=GOLD]950[/color] range, [color=GOLD]30s[/color] cooldown

[color=YELLOW]Author:[/color] SirCoqalot./TrinkaLot.
[color=YELLOW]Element:[/color] [color=66cdaaff]Astral[/color]
[color=YELLOW]Attack:[/color] [color=GOLD]2273[/color] DPS, [color=00bfffff]Arcane[/color], [color=GOLD]850[/color] range
 
[color=GOLD]Time Travel[/color]

[color=GOLD]Timesurge - Aura[/color]
Increases triggerchance of nearby towers.

[color=LIGHT_BLUE]An ancient building, storing the power of storms.[/color]
[color=YELLOW]Author:[/color] Natac
[color=YELLOW]Element:[/color] [color=ffffe0ff]Storm[/color]
[color=YELLOW]Attack:[/color] [color=GOLD]1185[/color] DPS, [color=1e90ffff]Energy[/color], [color=GOLD]900[/color] range
[color=YELLOW]Mana:[/color] [color=CORNFLOWER_BLUE]10000[/color] ([color=CORNFLOWER_BLUE]+0[/color]/sec)
 
[color=GOLD]Specials[/color]
[color=GOLD]+500[/color] mana/lvl
 
[color=GOLD]Cloud of Absorption - Aura[/color]
Creates a lightning ball if a creep in range is killed with more damage than needed. The lighting ball absorbs the redundant damage and transfers it to this temple as mana.
 
[color=GOLD]Cloudy Thunderstorm[/color]
Summons [color=GOLD]Cloudy Thunderstorm[/color] which strikes random creeps in range, dealing spell damage.

 
Mana cost: [color=GOLD]1000[/color], [color=GOLD]1000[/color] range, [color=GOLD]0.01s[/color] cooldown

 
[color=GOLD]Adjust Thunderstorm Threshold[/color]
Adjust the percentual mana required for [color=GOLD]Cloudy Thunderstorm[/color].

 
[color=GOLD]0.01s[/color] cooldown
